overview:
M3M Golf Estate sets an amazing example of sophisticated living in the heart of the business hub of Delhi NCR- Gurgaon. Situated on the Golf Course road, M3M Golf Estate is spread out over a vast area of 75 acres, and offers 3and 4 bedroom Apartments.

M3M is coming soon with the lifestyle luxury living. Creating finest Condominium community with unique features like: <ul> <li>9 Hole Executive Golf Course</li> <li>Largest Condominium spread over in 75 acres</li> <li>World class Golf club house besides the community clubs</li> <li>Large water bodies along the greens with extensive landscape features</li> <li>Apartments starting from 2ndlevel upwards offering contiguous View of Golf even while driving or walking</li> <li>All apartments facing the greens</li> <li>Variety of options in 3 BR & 4BR</li> <li>All approvals in place</li> </ul>
